trends: There have been no other sightings in Lalitpur
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsme and my friends were at the terrace of my friends house just for some air, when one of my friend named *(name deleted--cms\sg) saw it for the first time. it was reddish orange in colour and blinking. my other friend said that may be a plane or a helicopter. but as we knew plane flying in night gave white light which looked like flurescent. and helicoptor could not fly as fast as it could have . we just decided to take video of it and i took my mobile phone with camera and tried to take the film but while zooming i took picture of it and took video for about 11 seconds. then suddenly it hovered just at one place and dissappeared. after that we discussed about it and with in 5 or so minutes other 2 same kind of object started to came from the same direction. they both had the same colour and the blinking effect with the same velocity of speed as the one of before. so we started taking videos which lasted for about 2 min and 24 secs. as, i have been watching documentaries about ufo sightings and as the characteristics of the above objects showed the same characteristics i've seen and heared in the ufo documentaries, we decided they must be ufos. we were very much excited as known to us. here in my country there arent much ufo enthusiastic and we saw it on the first hand. the video we have taken havent much details as it was taken by low quality of mobile phone camera and zoomed till the last. but the picture i've taken showed what we saw, as i zoomed it through photoshop it was amazing to see what we saw yesterday night.
Summary: We saw it as a reddish orange coloured blimp.
